name: Sushobhit Rajan
bio: I'm an AI engineer specializing in Large Language Models, autonomous agents, and the Model Context Protocol (MCP). I build intelligent systems that leverage cutting-edge AI to solve real-world problems.

My work focuses on creating robust agent architectures, implementing MCP servers for seamless tool integration, and developing LLM-powered applications that push the boundaries of what's possible with AI.
I'm passionate about the intersection of software engineering and artificial intelligence, constantly exploring new ways to make AI agents more capable, reliable, and accessible.
highlights: Expert in LLM integration and prompt engineering
Open source contributor to AI tooling
